description: Runs a spatial crossmatch between 2 catalogs of objects using the Zones algorithm.
parameters: @table1 SYSNAME: first input catalog; @table2 SYSNAME: second input catalog; @radius FLOAT: search radius in arcseconds (default 10); @id_col1 SYSNAME: unique identifier column in table1 (default 'objid'); @id_col2 SYSNAME: unique identifier column in table2 (default 'objid'); @ra_col1 SYSNAME: RA column in table1 (default 'ra'); @ra_col2 SYSNAME: RA column in table2 (default 'ra'); @dec_col1 SYSNAME: Dec column in table1 (default 'dec'); @dec_col2 SYSNAME: Dec column in table2 (default 'dec'); @max_catalog_rows1 BIGINT: optional row limit for table1; @max_catalog_rows2 BIGINT: optional row limit for table2; @output_table SYSNAME: optional output table; @only_nearest BIT: return only closest match; @sort_by_separation BIT: sort output by separation; @include_sep_rank BIT: include separation rank column; @include_radec BIT: include RA/Dec columns in output; @print_messages BIT: print time-stamped messages
return_value: RETURNS TABLE (id1, id2, sep [+ optional sep_rank, ra1, dec1, ra2, dec2])
